summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: [Weekly Point Cosmetic Rose edition mask sheet] - Facial skin care mask sheet 3solutions(Wriklecare, Brighten up, Moisture) in one (1Pack of 10pcs) Review Date: 2020/02/02 Store: Weekly Point Cosmetic Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Weekly Point Cosmetic', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture,Skin', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 4.84 x 7.01 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} Review Text: I’ve been using sheet masks for years. Long before they became something you could buy at your local pharmacy so I’m used to reading the adorable translations on the back (see photo)

That aside the mask is a little on the small side and I think I have an average sized face. It does stretch though and the benefit is that it doesn’t get in your hair. Lots of serum with this one, or mask juice as I like to call it
so at the end of the mask time you have enough to apply extra to your face a neck.

I left it for the full 20 minutes and my skin did feel soft and moisturised. I used it after a transatlantic flight and my skin really needed the hydration. Obviously you won’t see any miracles after one use but do make it part of your weekly or twice weekly routine for maximum effect.

Don’t be tempted to leave it on longer or sleep with it. All masks will just dry out and negate the benefits.

This is a nice addition to my sheet mask collection. Review Title: Lovely and hydrating. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Glass Nail File - JORLAI 2PC Nano Nail Shiner Nail Files Polisher Glass Nail Buffers Professional Crystal Manicure Tools Kit for Natural Nails Review Date: 2020/09/08 Store: JORLAI Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '712322500167'} Review Text: These are very cute and sparkly and come in their own case. I like that they’re nice and small and the thickness is great for shaping the sides of your nails. I found the buffing part slow going and it took quite a while to build up a shine but I’m happy with the end result. My nails took a real beating from gel so I’m giving them a break from all polish and this really helps build a lovely shine. Review Title: Gives a good natural shine Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Friendly Face Cleanser, Quick Cleansing Dry Tissue 20 Packs - Dry Facial Wipes Makeup Remover Travel Size, Exfoliating Wipes For Face Review Date: 2020/10/04 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '20', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 2.76 x 3.94 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a solid five stars. I'm a flight attendant and it's such a pain to have to take a variety of products when you travel and some countries have liquid restrictions.

I used this as soon as I got to my hotel with low expectations that were quickly blown away. You use wet it with warm water and it takes off all makeup including mascara. You rinse with water afterwards but it's not overly soapy so you don't have to worry about getting soap in your eyes. I've used this at home and then used a cotton wool pad with my usual makeup remover expecting some residue makeup but nothing was left. I'm so impressed with these and as one pad will take off all your makeup it's really good value. Review Title: Sensational Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bodipure Baking Soda Natural Vegetable Sport Bar Soap 3 Pack - Refreshing & Cooling Mint - Deodorizing Cleanser for Face and Body - 4 oz. ea Review Date: 2020/11/05 Store: Bodipure Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All, Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Bodipure', 'Scent': 'Clean, natural mint', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 2.25 x 1 inches; 14.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '838347004388', 'Manufacturer': 'Bodipure, Inc.'} Review Text: The best soap I’ve used bar none. Seriously.

I came in from the garden where I’d been stacking a cord of firewood and planting bulbs. My hands were filthy and cracked. This soap made the dirt dissolve immediately. I know that’s what soap does but with this it just vanishes without even having to scrub, even from under my nails. It has a light mint scent and isn’t drying at all. I didn’t know I could get that excited about washing my hands. I tried it in the shower and my skin felt clean and smooth without feeling dry. Even my husband who doesn’t like anything remotely “girly” was a fan.

The hand mask that came with it was lovely and moisturising. Review Title: The best soap I’ve used. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Review Date: 2020/11/20 Store: Karuna Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} Review Text: This is a really great sheet mask pack. It hits all your skincare needs. These are the cloth style masks which I always find have more serum, better sticking power and a better fit than the hydrogel masks.

The eye patches I especially liked. They're packed full of serum, stay on well and cover the whole under eye and side area. The brightening face mask did seem to make my skin more even and brighter but it does say not for sensitive skin. I do sometimes have some sensitivity issues but didn't experience that with any of the masks.

There's enough serum in all the masks that you can use the excess the next day as a serum or swipe over your décolletage. I like to keep my masks in the fridge. They feel great when they're chilled. This is definitely a product I'll be buying again. Review Title: great selection. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Anon Make Up Remover Wipes 10ct | Individually Wrapped Natural Vitamin E and Aloe Vera | Bamboo Mini Makeup Wipes | AirBnB’s Choice for Convenient Single Use Face Wipes | Paraben and Alcohol Free Review Date: 2021/01/13 Store: Oil Slick Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Oil Slick', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '760354449145'} Review Text: I'm a flight attendant and love using makeup wipes on the road as it's so much easier than carting around lotions and potions. Sadly the wipes I got were quite dry and as such really didn't do much to remove my makeup. I had to use about five to make a dent in it and I really don't wear too much makeup other than a bit of concealer and CC cream. That said they don't have any sort of strong scent and didn't cause any irritation. I'd use them to freshen up my skin but I'll to pass on using them as a makeup wipe. Note: if you are using them to remove makeup it does say to rinse your skin with water afterwards. Review Title: Not effective at removing makeup but a good fresher upper Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: CHEROO Heated Eye Mask, Weighted Eye Compress with Natural Flaxseed & Adjustable Strap, Moist Heat for Men Women Dry Eyes, Blepharitis, Stye & Puffy Eyes (blue) Review Date: 2021/03/04 Store: CHEROO Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CHEROO', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 2.4 x 1.73 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'eyeBLUE-S', 'UPC': '782125484506', 'Manufacturer': 'CHEROO'} Review Text: This mask has three heat and time settings. The cord is long enough that I was able to plug it in right by my bed. I used it when I came home from a red eye flight and the term “red eye” has never been more appropriate. My eyes felt like sandpaper. I used it on the highest heat setting and it really does get very warm but not uncomfortably so. I set it for 15 mins and fell asleep with it on. I’ve used it a few times since and it makes me feel so relaxed and soothes my eyes and reduces redness and puffiness. Review Title: Wonderfully relaxing. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of purchase history reflects a strong preference for skincare and self-care products, particularly those that provide moisturizing and hydrating benefits. Consistently high ratings indicate satisfaction, especially with items that offer multiple functionalities, such as sheet masks that promote hydration and brightening. The purchase of facial cleansing wipes suggests a prioritization of convenience, particularly for travel purposes, indicating a lifestyle that values practicality in beauty routines.

Common themes include a focus on natural ingredients and soothing properties, aligning with a preference for gentle, effective cleansing and skincare solutions. Recurring mentions of quality in the efficacy of the products further affirm a tendency toward higher-quality items, even amidst some price sensitivity noted in the mixed satisfaction with lower-rated makeup remover wipes.

Customers showcase a strong inclination toward aesthetic and skin health, as evidenced by interest in tools that promote nail care and eye relaxation. The overall trend reflects a commitment to maintaining healthy skin, showcasing enjoyment in both routine self-care practices and effective, natural beauty products. Ultimately, core preferences center around hydration, convenience, and the blending of quality with natural ingredients, forming a holistic approach to personal wellness.

target_interaction.title: A decent micellar water pad
target_interaction.text:
These are really handy to have. I find using a makeup removing cream or gel a bit annoying and any sort of wash type remover ends up trailing down my arms and neck. You know how when you see women on movies gently splashing their faces and not making a mess? Well that's not me. So back to the pads. I do like them. They're nicely soaked and a decent size, about the size of a large cotton pad but it took 3 pads to make an inroad at removing my makeup and I don't think I plaster it on, just a bit of foundation, some mascara and a bit of blush. The bonus is that you can use both sides but I do think it could do a better job at actual makeup remover. For a quick cleanup and removing tinted moisturiser it does a good enough job. If you're using it as part of a multi phase make up removal which I do when I have the time and motivation then this is a great second step. I didn't have any adverse reactions. I didn't dislike them, I just wasn't blown away by them and my search for the unicorn of make up removers continues.

All in all they work as well as your average micellar water with the added convenience of having the pad and micellar water all in one.
target_interaction.title_meta: KLAVUU Pure Pearlsation pH Balancing Quick Cleansing Pad 100ea - Powerful Makeup Mild Exfoliating Cleansing Pad without Skin Irritation, Intense Moisturizing
